mdRecord.dcterms:description: This typed document is a resolution to "turn over the real estate and cash in hand beloging to the said trust" for Central School-house to the Town of Lexington "to be used in such manner as said Council shall deem expedient, in connection with securing a seven (7) room brick school building with Auditorium for the colored schools of Lexington." There is only one page but the typed page numer (1) would indicate the prescence of other pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Resolution on Central School, 1923
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: African Americans -- Education
African American schools
African American teachers
Virginia -- Lexington
